details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 19005-4:2020 - 6.7.3 Version identification - rev property
details.description: The value of pdfaid:rev shall be the four digit year.

rule.description: The value of pdfaid:rev shall be the four digit year.

error.message: The value of pdfaid:rev (%1) not the four digit year.
